notice.title:
Event
Notification
notice.description1: Any prizes won may be withdrawn and canceled if you participate in the event in an illegal or abnormal way.
notice.description2: Lucky draw chances will only be given for purchases of products that are on the black friday sale at the time of the purchase except for the one chance that is given on first log-in.
notice.description3: You can win at most once per ID.
notice.description4: The available lucky draw chances will be accumulated until the end of the event.
notice.description5: The 3-months trial serial code for Clip Studio EX can only be registered on 1 device.
notice.description6: There may be restrictions if you register the serial code on 2 or more Clip Studio accounts.
notice.description7: Once the 150 daily serial codes are all given out, the ‘Click to win’ button will be disabled and no entries will be accepted. The button will be reopen at 00AM (KST) the next day.

cometDeal.couponZoneDesciption1: •  The coupon can only be downloaded once by one ID.
cometDeal.couponZoneDesciption2: •  You can check the issued coupon on My Page.
cometDeal.couponZoneDesciption3: •  This coupon cannot be used together with other coupons.
cometDeal.couponZoneDesciption4: •  The coupon is subject to change or end without notice under company circumstances.
cometDeal.couponZoneDesciption5: •  If you have any problems with downloading or applying coupons, please ask ‘Support’
cometDeal.couponZoneDesciption6: •  This coupon cannot be applied to cosmic and comet deals in progress.
